summary:
Crafting now actually requires you to own the right tools.
No more magical I-own-a-hammer-from-the-beginning.
From the People Are Strangers mod authors.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=6][color=#0000ff][i][url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=317637947]Now also available on Steam Workshop[/url][/i][/color]

[color=#00ff00]Description[/color][/size]

[size=3]I always found it rather strange that the Dovahkiin always could use any forge, tanning rack, etc without actually having any tools in his inventory. This is why I created this mod. Now, if you want to be able to Smith or Temper, a blacksmith hammer will be required. If you want to brew potions, you will need a wooden bowl. If you want to use a tanning rack, an iron dagger will be required. You will need a wooden laddle if you want to cook something. Smelting will require a shovel, and if you want to be a lumberjack, a hook will be necessary (you should use a mod like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22952/?]Usable Sawmills[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3346064]lojames[/url], even though this is not necessary for this mod to run).
All of these items can be found in the game normally. You can buy hooks from vendors or find them on lumberjacks. You can also craft them. Shovels, laddles and wooden bowls can also be found in pretty much all buildings and are craftable as well.
This mod contains some scripts but they will [color=#ff0000]never[/color] be running all the time, they will run only once when you do some actions, not during standard gameplay.
When crafting items, your hammer has a chance to break, depending on your Smithing skill.[/size]

[size=6][color=#00ff00]Installation[/color]

[/size][size=3]Install this mod using NMM or Mod Manager, or any other software you usually use. If installing manually, drop all files in your Skyrim/DATA folder and activate the mod.

[/size][size=6][color=#00ff00]Uninstall[/color]

[/size][size=3]Delete all files related to this mod.

[/size][size=6][color=#00ff00]Requirements[/color]

[/size][size=3]An updated version of Skyrim is required.
